DOC.brief_summary: Subtle myocardial deformation abnormalities in asymptomatic nf-1 patients: is cardiac screening needed?
DOC.brief_title: Subtle Myocardial Deformation Abnormalities in Asymptomatic Nf-1 Patients
DOC.criteria: asymptomatic NF1 patients aged 017y and 11 months clinical heart failure, history of cardiovascular disease chronic renal insufficiency
